Package pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1

Class ReadingRoom

java.lang.Object
pl.edu.agh.kis.pz1.ReadingRoom
public class ReadingRoom extends Object
Class representing the reading room. The reading room encapsulates:
  • number of readers in the reading room,
  • number of writer in the reading room,
  • number of waiting readers in the reading room,
  • number of waiting writers in the reading room,
  • books in the reading room

      Sets number of writers in the reading room.
      Parameters:
      writers - new number of writers.

      public int getReaders()
      Gets number of readers in the reading room.
      Returns:
      number of readers.

      Parameters:

      public void setWaitingWriters(int writers)

    • getWaitingWriters

      public int getWaitingWriters()
      Gets number of waiting writers.
      Returns:
      number of waiting writers.

    • startWriting

      public void startWriting()
      Makes that writers enters to the reading room or makes him wait for his turn. The writer can enter where there is any other writer or reader. Informs also about number of writers/readers in reading room and waiting writers/readers. It is synchronized method.

    • endWriting

      public void endWriting()
      Makes that writer ends writing and goes out. It is synchronized method.

    • startReading

      public void startReading(int numberOfReadBooks)
      Makes that readers starts reading or makes him wait for his turn. The reader can enter where there is any writer or number of reader is less than 5. Informs also about number of writers/readers in reading room and waiting writers/readers. It is synchronized method.
      Parameters:
      numberOfReadBooks - number of read books by this reader.

    • endReading

      public void endReading()
      Makes that readers end reading and goes out. It is synchronized method.
